name: trailblazing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
being the first to do or use something, in a way that is an example for other people: He cited the California judges' trailblazing role in overturning a ban on interracial marriage 56 years ago.

the fact of being the first to do or use something, in a way that is an example for other people: As a young medical student when there were very few other women students, she learned something about the difficulties of trailblazing.
